```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = F, warning = F)

library(tidyverse)

```

```{r }
#load phenotype data
pheno_data <- read_csv("../data/pheno_meta_data.csv")

#load russet apples
russet_apples <- read_csv("../data/russet_apples.csv")

#load dead tree phenotype from final ABC phenotype table
all_abc_phenos <- read_csv("../data/20190322_final_all_abc_phenos.csv")

dead <- all_abc_phenos %>% select(apple_id, dead_trees)

#load blossom and shoot fire blight data from GRIN
fb_shoot <- read_csv("../data/fire_blight_shoot.csv")
fb_shoot <- select(fb_shoot, accession_id, observation_value, plant_name, taxon)

fb_blossom <- read_csv("../data/fire_blight_blossom.csv")

```
